sentences.en: A yeoman farmer model of price setting under monopolistic competition.
sentences.cn: 垄断竞争中自耕农定价模式.

sentences.en: After 20 years development, China's sports products industry monopolistic competition.
sentences.cn: 中国的体育用品行业经过20多年的发展, 已经处于垄断竞争状态.

sentences.en: But the market is blocked from working by a web of laws , regulations, and monopolistic restrictions.
sentences.cn: 但一大堆法律法规和垄断限制使得该市场无法正常运转.

sentences.en: But when business will be a monopolistic situation, this issue will appear.
sentences.cn: 但是当业务会出现垄断情况时, 这种问题就会出现.

sentences.en: Imperialism is monopolistic, parasitic and moribund capitalism.
sentences.cn: 帝国主义是垄断的 、 寄生的、垂死的资本主义.

sentences.en: Moreover, because is in the monopolistic position, the letter society grade of service bad, deficient enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 另外, 因处于垄断地位, 农信社服务质量差, 缺乏积极性.

sentences.en: Now consider the internal IRS using the monopolistic competition setup for firms.
sentences.cn: 现在考虑内部规模报酬递增,市场结构为垄断竞争.

sentences.en: Since markets are interconnected and some banks occupy quasi - monopolistic positions, we must consider breaking them up.
sentences.cn: 由于市场之间相互关联,一些银行占据着近似于垄断的地位, 我们必须思考如何打破垄断.

sentences.en: The capitalists are reaping rich harvest from monopolistic ownership.
sentences.cn: 资本家靠垄断所有权获得丰厚的利润.

sentences.en: The capitalists are reaping rich harvest from their monopolistic ownership.
sentences.cn: 资本家正从私人占有制中获得暴利.

sentences.en: The capitalists are reaping rich harvests from their monopolistic ~.
sentences.cn: 资本家正从垄断所有权中大肆收获财富.

sentences.en: The company wants to maintain its monopolistic position.
sentences.cn: 公司想继续维持它的垄断地位。

sentences.en: The judge ruled that Microsoft had behaved in a monopolistic way.
sentences.cn: 法官判定微软的行为属于垄断.

sentences.en: The main appeal of the monopolistic competition model is not its realism, but its simplicity.
sentences.cn: 垄断竞争模型产品有差异,但不能完全替代.模型不一定在于现实性, 而在于其简单性.

sentences.en: The model of monopolistic competition was considered important when it was introduced for two reasons.
sentences.cn: 在垄断竞争模型,当它认为重要的是有两个原因介绍.

sentences.en: This paper discusses how a monopolistic manufacturer producing a single product maximizes his profit.
sentences.cn: 考虑了生产单一产品的垄断制造商如何最大化收益的问题.

words.tran_cn: [贸易] 买主独家垄断，买主垄断
垄断；独占；拥有…的专卖权

trans.tran_en: controlling or trying to control an industry or business activity completely
